page.title: 11SCHOOLS IN CATON+BROOKHOUSE
page.content: There are two primary schools in Caton and Brookhouse.Caton St Paul's C.E. Primary School was opened in 1842 at Moorside.The first headteachers we know of were Mr & Mrs R.Wright and they left in 1899 after 21 successive years. Mr Wright was awarded a gold purse.At one time the numbers rose to 365 pupils. Because of this bulge classes had to be taken in the Church Hall. There are now 6teachers and 140 children.The Head is Mrs.B.Hartley. The school was recently featured in the T.V. programme "This Is Your Life" about comedian Jim Bowen,who once taught at the school.Caton County Primary school was built in 1973 and was opened 3rd September1974.Before the school was built the land was used for a mill called Rumble Row Mill.At first there were 36 children but the number is now 102.The Head is Mr.A.Roberts who has a staff of 4.3 teachers.
